Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: rvm

Arguments.Name: --help
Arguments.Description: Show help for rvm

Arguments.Name: use
Arguments.Description: Setup current shell to use a specific ruby version

Arguments.Name: rbx
Arguments.Description: Rubinius

Arguments.Name: --version
Arguments.Description: Show version of rvm

Arguments.Name: --default
Arguments.Description: When used with ruby selection, sets a default ruby for new shells

Arguments.Name: --debug
Arguments.Description: Enable debug mode

Arguments.Name: --force
Arguments.Description: Force install, removes old install & source before install

Arguments.Name: --all
Arguments.Description: Used with 'rvm list' to display 'most' available versions

Arguments.Name: --summary
Arguments.Description: Used with 'do' to print out a summary of the commands run

Arguments.Name: C
Arguments.Description: Custom configure options, comma separated, double quote args that need quoting, default

Arguments.Description: Custom configure options, comma separated, double quote args that need quoting, default

Arguments.Name: default
Arguments.Description: Use RVM set default ruby and system if it hasn't been set

Arguments.Name: --version
Arguments.Description: Show version of rvm

Arguments.Name: --default
Arguments.Description: When used with ruby selection, sets a default ruby for new shells

Arguments.Name: --debug
Arguments.Description: Enable debug mode

Arguments.Name: --force
Arguments.Description: Force install, removes old install & source before install

Arguments.Name: --all
Arguments.Description: Used with 'rvm list' to display 'most' available versions

Arguments.Name: --summary
Arguments.Description: Used with 'do' to print out a summary of the commands run

Arguments.Name: C
Arguments.Description: Custom configure options, comma separated, double quote args that need quoting, default
